description:
Taiki got a Shirei, transformed into a Kirin, and made Gyoso his king.  But he believes he made a mistake and Gyoso would be killed by Heaven.  After Gyoso and Taiki receives the Heaven’s decree, Gyoso invites Keiki to the palace for Taiki.  Keiki sets up a meeting for Taiki, Shoryu and Rokuta.  When Taiki cannot bow to Shoryu, he realizes that he chose the right king.  By hearing this story, Yoko learns that the fact that a Kirin chooses a person is the Heaven’s Mission.  Yoko is now ready to be a queen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaze no Umi, Meikyuu no Kishi - Shuushou
The Sea of Wind, The Shore of The Maze - Last Chapter
風の海 迷宮の岸 終章
